Let’s unite to save 23-year-old CA Rohit’s life. Rohit is battling Guillain-Barré Syndrome (GBS) in the ICU at Kokilaben Hospital, Mumbai. The treatment is critical, and the per-day cost is between ₹1–2 lakhs. Hospital bills have crossed ₹10 lakhs, and the family needs to raise ₹40 lakhs for recovery. Donation Link: https://t.co/OKDa1NMUh2. UPI Handle: supportrohi35@yesbank
